Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Big Poe Bottle#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe Silver Rupee Ledge

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

LW (Bridge).text: I am @, hero of the Gossip Stones! Hear my name and tremble!

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Farore's Wind#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.
